page.title: 10NEW INN,5 LANES END,NEEDWOOD
page.content:
This inn, originally known as the Mosley Arms Inn, was built for the use of farm workers from the large estates in the area. It is now owned by Bass Brewery.
As well as the usual{bar}and{lounge, there is a{wine bar}and a{restaurant. Since the inn is distant from the local villages, there is not a lot of local trade.
However people from Burton upon Trent and other local villages come out for a meal, especially at weekends, and there is a{large car park}to cater for this trade.
The inn provides part time{employment for a small number of people from the area.
